snippet.title: Falcon Age on Nintendo Switch and Steam out now!
snippet.description:
Raise a falcon and go on an adventure to save your land.

Outerloop Games’ Falcon Age will touch down on Switch and Steam on October 8th for $19.99 USD with a 25% off launch discount. The Steam and Switch versions also come with over a year of content updates including new quests, an upgrade system for your falcon, revamped cooking and hunting mechanics and a slew of quality of life updates. 

The Switch version supports touch controls to pet your falcon and gyro controls with your joycons. The Steam version supports VR with most popular headsets like the Valve Index, HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Quest. You can play seated, standing or use room-scale VR.
